title: Princess Puff Quilt - Pink & White
description: Princess Margie enjoying her Princess Puff Quilt.

title: Princess Puff Quilt - Closer Top View
description: Here is a closer view of the Pricess Puff Quilt showing the Little Mermaid and Pricess Aurora fabric.

title: Princess Puff Quilt - Closer Backing View
description: The quilted back fabric has a mixture of different princesses in gold and with a pink background.

title: Sleeping Beauty Quilting Makeup Bag
description: This was my first makeup bag ever, and I made it using Sleeping Beauty themed fabric with Maleficent on the inside.

title: Sleeping Beauty Quilting Makeup Bag Full View
description: This is the whole view of the Sleeping Beauty themed makeup bag I made, featuring quilted fabric and a zipper closure. I use it for sewing pins now.

title: Little Mermaid Travel Bag
description: This is my first travel bag made with Little Mermaid themed quilting fabric. I have a little zipper on the inside as well for more storage.

title: Alice in Wonderland Basket - Inner View
description: Soft-sided storage basket that I made for my sewing supplies, featuring Alice in Wonderland themed fabric.

title: Alice in Wonderland Basket - Outer View
description: Soft-sided storage basket that I made for my sewing supplies, featuring Alice in Wonderland themed fabric.

title: Cozy Coco Quilt - Full View
description: Made in honor of my in-law's late dog Coco.

title: Cozy Coco Quilt - Head View
description: Made in honor of my in-law's late dog Coco.

title: Wedding Party Favor Bags
description: I mostly made the cat stickers for these bags that were used as party favors for my wedding party. I designed the stickers after photos of my cats.
